template.name: Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.0
template.description:
Monitor HPE MSA storages. Tested with HP MSA P2000 G3, HP MSA 2040, HP MSA 2050, HP MSA2324FC.
Version: 0.6.6

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ping check
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} CPU Load
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card health status, numeric
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card status, numeric
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status, numeric
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} IOPS
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status, numeric
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status, numeric
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} web interface status

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) ping failed
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status is {ITEM.VALUE}
CPU load on {#CONTROLLER.ID} too high: {ITEM.VALUE}
Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Web interface on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) is down

discovery_rule.name: Disk groups discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA disk groups.

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} health status (numeric). Disk group tier: {#DG.TIER}

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current owner, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} owner (numeric). Disk group tier: {#DG.TIER}

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} preferred owner, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} preferred owner (numeric). Disk group tier: {#DG.TIER}

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} with type {#DG.TYPE} operational status (numeric). Disk group tier: {#DG.TIER}

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Disk Group and Vdisk status

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.0:msa.dg["{#DG.ID}","owner-num"].last()}<>{Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.0:msa.dg["{#DG.ID}","owner-pref-num"].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current owner is not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Current disk group {#DG.ID} not preferred for this one.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status in {ITEM.LASTVALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status in {ITEM.LASTVALUE} state.

discovery_rule.name: Physical disks discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA physical disks.

item_prototype.name: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} error status
item_prototype.description: Health error status of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

item_prototype.name: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Health status of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN} (numeric)

item_prototype.name: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} power on hours
item_prototype.description: Power on hours of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

item_prototype.name: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature
item_prototype.description: Temperature of physical disk {#DISK.ID} with SN {#DISK.SN}.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} last error status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} has errors.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} summary power on hours are too high: {ITEM.VALUE} hours
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} summary work hourse are too high. Maybe, you should replace it. Check device owner manual. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} temperature is over critical threshold: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature is in critical state: {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} temperature is over warning threshold: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature too high: {ITEM.VALUE}

dependency.name: Disk {#DISK.ID} temperature is over critical threshold: {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} health status (numeric).

item_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} operational status (numeric).

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is not UP.

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" health status (numeric)

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} speed, rpm
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" rpm.

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" operational status (numeric)

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed to low
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed to low ({ITEM.VALUE}).

item_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} with type {#POOL.TYPE} health status (numeric).

item_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} with type {#POOL.TYPE} owner (numeric)

item_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} with type {#POOL.TYPE} preferred owner (numeric)

trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} current owner not preferred for this pool.

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

item_prototype.name: Port {#PORT.ID} health status, numeric
item_prototype.description: Port {#PORT.ID} ({#PORT.SPEED}) with type {#PORT.TYPE} health status (numeric).

item_prototype.description: Port {#PORT.ID} ({#PORT.SPEED}) with type {#PORT.TYPE} operational status (numeric).

trigger_prototype.description: Port {#PORT.ID} SFP module operational status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA power supplies.

item_prototype.description: Power supply {#POWERSUPPLY.ID} in location "{#POWERSUPPLY.LOCATION}" health status (numeric).
